name: The Adventure of Elfyn's Ghostly Dungeon
name_original: The Adventure of Elfyn's Ghostly Dungeon
description:
Submission for Miz Jam 1 game jam. Required us to use the art pack "1-Bit Pack" https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack.

HOW TO PLAY:
- WASD or Arrow Keys to move

- Mouse to attack

- E to interact
